content.description:
Climbing Routes; Left to Right on Shady Wall:

Left Sector:````````````~~~~~

~

1a. Psyguy 5.10a/b * kids route, leftmost block.

1. Prowler: 5.11+ short, rust colored wall behind tree.

2. Run For Your Money: 5.10a * Common warm-up, awkward start from boulder, or right, good high overhang.

3. Traditional Corner: 5.7 mossy wall Schoz anchor.

4. Schnoz: 5.11c mossy prow.

5. Feel the Love: 5.10d ** right of right-facing corner, common warm up.6a. Force The Issue: 5.12b ** extension, left finish Made in the Shade.

6. Made in the Shade: 5.12a *** soft black wall.7. Air Johnston: 5.12b/c *** major right angling crack, 2 finishes.

8. My Air Jordans: 5.13b *** direct start, black wall.

9. Pumped Up Kicks: 5.13b *** crack to thin wall.

9a. 9a project; direct finish.

10. Big Wray: 5.11d *** right facing corner

Flowstone Sector:~~~~

11. Shady Lady: 5.11a ** left route in sector.

12. Ooze, AKA Too Frugal to Frugel 5.10d ***

13. Flowstoned: 5.11d ** high crux

14. Love Handles: 5.11c/d * hand size cams at start.

15. Trevor's Crack: 5.11

16. Bubblebath: 5.11b

Right Sector:~~~~

17. Slap Happy: 5.13a ** black and blue bulges.

18. Great Divide: trad arch

19. Slim Shady: 5.12d *** 2 overhangs, middle wall.

20.The Kraken: 5.12a *** right undercut

21. Bad Medicine: 5.12d *** left hybrid 5.12c **

22. Slash and Burn: 5.12a *** crimps, slopers, finger locks, great finish.

23. Spider and Fly: 5.11d *

24. Delusion of Grandeur: 5.12b/c ** right facing corner, hard start.

25. Huec & Bake: 5.11

26. Aggressively Passive: 5.11d

27. Black Sabbath: 5.10 *

28. Lion's Gate: 5.12b ** boulder prow above approach trail.
Great route with a crux at the start and on the final headwall after pulling the roof.
